mapper.insert: insert into ST_GATE_R (ID, STCD, TM, EXKEY, EQPTP, EQPNO, GTOPNUM, GTOPHGT, GTQ, MSQMT, RunState, Ua, Ub, Uc, Ia, Ib, Ic, ActivePower, PowerFactor, IsRemote, Fault, IsControlEle, TopState, BottomState, TopMax, BottomMax, OpUser, RUP, RDW, YUP, YDW, GUP, GDW, Overload) values (#{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{STCD,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{TM,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{EXKEY,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{EQPTP,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{EQPNO,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{GTOPNUM,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{GTOPHGT,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{GTQ,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{MSQMT,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{runState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ua,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ub,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{uc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ia,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ib,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ic,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{activePower,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{powerFactor,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isRemote,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{fault,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{isControlEle,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{topState,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{bottomState,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{topMax,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{bottomMax,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{opUser,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{RUP,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{RDW,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{YUP,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{YDW,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{GUP,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{GDW,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{overload,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update ST_GATE_R set STCD = #{STCD,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, TM = #{TM,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXKEY = #{EXKEY,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, EQPTP = #{EQPTP,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, EQPNO = #{EQPNO,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, GTOPNUM = #{GTOPNUM,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GTOPHGT = #{GTOPHGT,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GTQ = #{GTQ,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MSQMT = #{MSQMT,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, RunState = #{runState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Ua = #{ua,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Ub = #{ub,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Uc = #{uc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Ia = #{ia,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Ib = #{ib,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Ic = #{ic,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ActivePower = #{activePower,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PowerFactor = #{powerFactor,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IsRemote = #{isRemote,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Fault = #{fault,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, IsControlEle = #{isControlEle,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, TopState = #{topState,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, BottomState = #{bottomState,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, TopMax = #{topMax,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, BottomMax = #{bottomMax,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, OpUser = #{opUser,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, RUP = #{RUP,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, RDW = #{RDW,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, YUP = #{YUP,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, YDW = #{YDW,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, GUP = #{GUP,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, GDW = #{GDW,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Overload = #{overload,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, STCD, TM, EXKEY, EQPTP, EQPNO, GTOPNUM, GTOPHGT, GTQ, MSQMT, RunState, Ua, Ub, Uc, Ia, Ib, Ic, ActivePower, PowerFactor, IsRemote, Fault, IsControlEle, TopState, BottomState, TopMax, BottomMax, OpUser, RUP, RDW, YUP, YDW, GUP, GDW, Overload from ST_GATE_R where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select ID, STCD, TM, EXKEY, EQPTP, EQPNO, GTOPNUM, GTOPHGT, GTQ, MSQMT, RunState, Ua, Ub, Uc, Ia, Ib, Ic, ActivePower, PowerFactor, IsRemote, Fault, IsControlEle, TopState, BottomState, TopMax, BottomMax, OpUser, RUP, RDW, YUP, YDW, GUP, GDW, Overload from ST_GATE_R

select top 1 ID, STCD, TM, EXKEY, EQPTP, EQPNO, GTOPNUM, GTOPHGT, GTQ, MSQMT, RunState, Ua, Ub, Uc, Ia, Ib, Ic, ActivePower, PowerFactor, IsRemote, Fault, IsControlEle, TopState, BottomState, TopMax, BottomMax, OpUser, RUP, RDW, YUP, YDW, GUP, GDW, Overload from ST_GATE_R where STCD = #{stcd} and EQPNO = #{eqpno} order by TM desc
